h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 8
content: The next Blood of the Iron Bull can be found at the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Temple Entrance Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Head up the stairs, and once you are about halfway up, turn to your right, and you will see a chest. Inside this chest is the material.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 8'.
The content is as follows:
The next Blood of the Iron Bull can be found at the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Temple Entrance Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Head up the stairs, and once you are about halfway up, turn to your right, and you will see a chest. Inside this chest is the material.
